post.body: Yeah, just watched a CNN special on how closely Poland was watching American politics in 2000.
Post-Web2.0 The web will follow the user. Folks will have central control of all their info (ex. health), media and converstations
Good idea! I'll also put the first aid kit where they can get to it. That should cover me for a couple of hours.
Breaking bad news with baby animals: http://twurl.cc/9r8. BTW, a few of you should be expecting a card from me in the next week or so.
RT @everydaydude: is paging Portland peeps to read this: http://tinyurl.com/5vs5oz
Recently wrapped up a fun video for our friends at Prolifiq. Hope @deangulstad doesn't leave us for a FT hand acting gig http://twurl.cc/9di
My son said that my leftover turkey stew "reminded" him of barf. For a 7-year-old, I should take that as a compliment, right?
Heading out to have some food and drinks with @substance, @levbabe and Keith Danziger. Maybe I should wear my clean socks...
Salvation Army is getting into social media: Twitter, Facebook. You can also donate by texting--amount added to your phone bill. Slick.
Watching video of @donmball interview James Eckenrode about the state of retail banking http://twurl.cc/7t8 #bai08
Thanks @lmacmarket ! Prolifiq and @lisaparker were awesome to work with--brilliant folks. A really fun project to be a part of!
Great article on Prolifiq's blog about what sales needs from marketing during tough times: http://twurl.cc/7qo
Note to self: when you run out of shredded mozerella for english muffin pizzas, don't use american cheese slices as a substitute.
Interesting--take a peek at Obama's technology plan as he consider's who will be the country's first CTO. http://twurl.cc/749
There's a social media 101 video conference going on right now at: http://twurl.cc/6mb
Oboma's tax cut calculator widget: http://twurl.cc/6k4. Can't seem to find the address input form so they know where to send my check...
McCain left on campaign bus overnight. http://twurl.cc/69u
How much should you be making if you're working for the man? Indeed salary search. http://twurl.cc/669 Check out the job trends too.
Oct 4, 2000, poles had Gore 11 pts ahead of Bush 51% to 40%.
My 4 y.o. just told me a cockamamie idea. Put cream cheese and a raspberry on top of a graham cracker. Ho-man is that good!
A cool FF extension that helps you collect, manage and store your Web research sources. Lots of nifty fieatures: http://www.zotero.org/
Looking for someone to installl a soundproof padded room my kids could use on snow days. I like 'em and all, but 4 days in a row...sheesh!
Can't make it to the video store because of the icy roads? Joost has some real gems, like Teenage Bikini Vampire: http://www.joost.com
